thread.title: Best Cities for Mixing Business and Pleasure
thread.title_full: Best Cities for Mixing Business and Pleasure

title: Best Cities for Mixing Business and Pleasure
text:
Best Cities for Mixing Business and Pleasure September 5, 2015 
Photo: Stocksy 
Bleisure is a thing. It’s combining a business trip with some leisure time or vacation. (We prefer the “bizcation,” but whatever.) 
One fun way to combine business and pleasure? Bring a date to you to help you enjoy all the five-star hotels and expensive restaurants you’ll be going to on your company’s dime. 
But not all business trip locations are created equal. So where is the best place to mix business with pleasure? MissTravel.com, a dating site for travelers, surveyed its members to find out. Here are the top 10 best destinations: 
(Photo: iStock)
